category.name: Product Structure.Duplicate
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DuplicateAllowedActions
preference.preference_description: Sets the allowed actions to be selectable in the RAC Duplicate dialog. Valid action values are: * Revise: allows a user to select a part to be revised during a Duplicate operation. * Replace: allows the user to select a part to be replaced by some other existing part during a Duplicate operation. Note: The Clone and Reference action values are always selectable as they are required by Duplicate operation at all times.
